page.title: 07Housing in Kingswood area
page.content: In the Kingswood area there are about 850 houses and they are very {expensive.}The cheapest house would be about Â£75,000 up to the largest which would cost about{half a million {pounds.}It is a very quite place and has a cross section of people living in it. In general, very well off people live there. The most popular area is{Warren Drive.}Usually the price that people look for is a house costing between Â£150,000 to Â£200,000. {New develpment}is taking place in the Kingswood area on one or two sites to keep pace with the growing demand for these fine houses. The largest, and most expensive, houses are to be found in Kingswood, Lower Kingswood and the remaning area consits of much cheaper and less substantial housing.
